journeyMessage: Leave a message and become part of our journey~ your words help tell our story!
invitationText: Though we come from different corners of the world, our paths crossed, and love found its way. Now, hand in hand, we begin a new journey as one. We invite you to celebrate our love and happiness in our new beginning. ♡
